special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The shaman can innately cast the following spells. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks).
* At Will: dancing lights, message, mage hand, thaumaturgy

descriptions.raw: * 1/day: augury, bestow curse, cordon of arrows, detect magic, hex, prayer of healing, speak with dead, spirit guardians
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1/day: augury, bestow curse, cordon of arrows, detect magic, hex, prayer of healing, speak with dead, spirit guardians

actions.name: Spear.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if wielded with two hands.

actions.name: Shortbow.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
